thread.section_title: River Palace Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fab!!!
thread.title_full: Fab!!! - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Judy H
title: Fab!!!
text:
My Husband and I stayed here for 3 nights at the start of March . The hotel is beautiful & full of character but the staff are what makes it . So pleasant and helpful . The rooms are small (like most hotels in rome) but Perfectly formed , absolutely everything you need , and the breakfast each morning was fantastic. Great choice of breads , buns , cereals , hot food etc . Also location is spot on!! can easily walk to ALL main attractions of but if preferred the Metro is a 2 minute walk from the hotel. Top class would highly recommend ,
Room Tip: go for the larger double room See more room tips
